gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 114, Hornets 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Detroit defeats Charlotte, 114-97. For Detroit, Cade Cunningham led the way with 22 points, six rebounds, and eight assists while aided by Jalen Duren (20 points, 10 rebounds) and Simone Fontecchio (17 points, eight rebounds, two steals) in the victory. Miles Bridges finished with 24 points and seven rebounds with Grant Williams adding 22 points, four rebounds, and two steals for the Raptors in the losing effort. Detroit improves to 11-53, while Charlotte moves to 16-49 in the loss.
